aya itha ruduru lesin ohuwa amathuweya."mokakda wune nemeyi tho mata mokakda kale".ese kiyamin aya nawathath ohuwa pasekata thallukara damuwaya.priyankarata kisiwak sithagatha nohakiwiya."ayi umbaata mathaka nadda awuruddakata kalin mayi mage daruwayi happala umbaa apiwa wathura parakata dala panala giya.man mage podi eki aran parata aawe mage manussaya nawe ayi balanna.tho pare ayine hitapu mawa happagena giya.apiwa saththu wage adagena gihin wathura parakata damma.man ewle marila nemeyi hitiye mage daruwa math ekkama gahagena giya".age das walin kadulu kadahalennata wiya.priyankara asalata pamini aya ohuge bellen alla esawuweya.itha apahasuwen berimata thath karana priyankara desa balu aya hadima musu mahahadin "mage daruwa mage as issarahamayi kabarayo ada ada kawe mata mage daruwa lagatawath yanna bari una deyiyane" kiyamin madak nihadawiya.nawathath wiyaruwen sinamusu balmak priyankara wethata helamin "ada idan umbaath man winda duka widinna oona" kiyamin ohuwa pasekata ada damiya.ee samagama atha thibu pihiya nalinige gela matha thaba adagaththe priyankarage ka gasima maddeya.ee samagama priyankara sihisunwa ada watuneya.

mawakage kusin bihiwela mulma warata as arala balana welawe indanma api ape awasan husma wathalayata ekathu karala deas piya ganna thuruma lokaya dakinne aalokaya ha andura athare athi wenasa thulin kiyalayi mata hithenne..me wenase athi gananaya kala nohaki tharame wiwidhathwaya thamayi api jiwithaya kiyala pintharu karanne...aneka warayak duk wedana windina athare soba dahama ape jiwitha samabara karanna hitha sathutu karanna dila thiyena eka awasthawak thamayi kala nirmana kiyanne...nima kala nohaki tharame nirmana apage asa thulin manasata gena enne sathutak..ee sathuta passe diwiyatama wenath aruthak ekathu karanawa..jiwithe issarahata yanne me aruth mathin..mama mehema praweshayak gaththe...mage eka winodanshayak thamayi foto ganna eka..mage asa andura aalokaya athare windina suwaya mata kohe hari satahan kara ganna ooni una.
